data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 173,236 believers in the state of Yoro to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yoro, Honduras
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 173,236 believers in Yoro, Honduras to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Yoro, Honduras. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Yoro do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 173,236 believers in Yoro.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Yoro, Honduras that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Yoro, Honduras by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Yoro
location.cities_list: El Progreso, Olanchito, Yoro, Santa Rita, Morazán
location.cities_list_w_pop: El Progreso (100,810), Olanchito (25,969), Yoro (15,774), Santa Rita (12,869), Morazán (11,076)
